item.title: Trump’s global tariffs paired with Elon Musk’s DOGE cuts could push the U.S. into ‘a far worse situation than 2008,’ Mark Cuban warns
item.description: Mark Cuban is warning that tariffs and DOGE cuts could result in long-term pain for the U.S. economy.

item.title: Donald Trump shares video claiming he’s ‘purposefully crashing the market’—but then insists ‘he doesn’t want anything to go down’
item.description: President Trump then told media aboard Air Force One: "I don't want anything to go down, but sometimes you have to take medicine to fix something."

item.title: Boeing starts to face first civil trial over 2019 Ethiopian Airlines 737 MAX crash that killed 157
item.description: Relatives of 155 of the victims had sued Boeing between April 2019 and March 2021 for wrongful death, negligence and other charges.

item.title: Thousands of North Korean IT workers have infiltrated the Fortune 500—and they keep getting hired for more jobs
item.description: “They are wildly successful,” said Google Threat Intelligence Group expert Michael Barnhart, who has been tracking North Korea and collecting intellig...

item.title: Crypto venture firms like Paradigm enjoy banner years, Multicoin posts 56% annual growth
item.description: New SEC filings show that crypto VCs had a massive bump in 2024.
